case_vignette: A 23-year-old female presents to the emergency department with right lower abdominal pain that began suddenly one hour ago. She is writhing in discomfort and has vomited twice since arrival. She has no chronic medical conditions, but states she has had chlamydia two or three times in the past. Her abdomen is firm, and she is guarding. Pelvic exam reveals blood pooling in the vagina and right adnexal tenderness. Her last menstrual period was 7 weeks ago. A pregnancy test is positive.
question: Which  is an appropriate next step in diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Obstetrics and Gynecology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask simple 1 line questions, one question at a time. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have sudden pain in the lower right side of my belly, I've thrown up twice, and I'm feeling really uncomfortable.
Have you experienced any fever or chills?
No, I haven't had any fever or chills.
Have you noticed any changes in your bowel habits?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my bowel habits.
Have you had this type of pain before?
No, this type of pain is new to me.
Do you have a history of any reproductive system conditions, such as endometriosis or ovarian cysts?
I've had chlamydia a few times, but no other conditions that I know of.
Do you have a family history of appendicitis or inflammatory bowel disease?
I don't have any medical knowledge, so I can't say whether I have a family history of those conditions.
Understood. Have you taken any medications recently or had any recent surgeries?
No, I haven't taken any medications recently or had any surgeries.
**Final Diagnosis:** Possible appendicitis
